meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sue Carey Art Thompson Peggi Malys Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1009.

td.p: Sue Carey, a computer consultant from Walnut Creek, California
Art Thompson, an attorney from Billings, Montana
Peggi Malys, a medical student from Orlando, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,800)

tr.td: ROYALTY
SPORTS QUOTES
ANAGRAMS
U.S. CITIES
CHOCOLATE
PRESIDENTIAL ASTROLOGY
